title: Quinebaug & Shetucket Rivers Valley National Heritage Corridor: Park Home
body: Preserving History  This is a special kind of park. It embraces numerous towns, villages and a total population of about 300,000. Quinebaug & Shetucket is not a traditional park. Instead, citizens, businesses, nonprofit cultural and environmental organizations, local and state governments, and the National Park Service work together to preserve and celebrate the region's cultural, historical and natural heritage.              Plan Your Visit   Learn what to do and where to go when you visit!
